description:
1. Video Increases Understanding Of Your Product Or Service by 74%

  2. YouTube Is The Number Two Search Engine In The World

    3. Every Day 100 Million Internet Users Watch An Online Video

    4. 50% of those are watching business or branded videos

    So, hands up if you want a kickass online video presence, and you want to reap the multitude of benefits that online video provides?

    Well, I can't see your hands but I assume if you're looking at this course then that is exactly what you want.

    The thing is, there is so much content out there, in fact 300 hours of video are uploaded to YouTube every minute! That's a hell of a lot of video to compete with when sending your own productions out in to the wild. The truth is, you don't need to compete with 99% of that content - with just a little bit of marketing knowledge your video can instantly rise above the rest and attract your target viewer.

    This course is free, and will teach you the basics of marketing your video online, a handful of useful strategies and an in-depth look at a couple fo social platforms to get you started.

    I will teach you what video marketing is, and a little of its history and place in modern business. You will learn how to fully optimise your video for YouTube so that it's found easily by both Google and YouTube viewers. I will guide you through the basic son marketing your videos on Facebook, Twitter and your own website as well as teaching you a couple of strategies to grow your audience and engage the viewers.

    So, what are you waiting for? Enrol now, and let's start building your audience today!
title: Video Marketing Primer
